Hero.title: Build In Public - 21-Day Independent Developer Challenge

Work.title: How it works
Work.description: Join our 21-day Build In Public challenge to accelerate your product development

step1.title: Set Your Goals
step1.description: Define your project goals for the 21-day challenge and share them with the community

step2.title: Daily Check-ins
step2.description: Share your progress, challenges, and solutions through regular check-ins in our Feishu group

step3.title: Get Feedback & Support
step3.description: Receive valuable feedback from peers and gain visibility for your project

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to common questions about the Build In Public challenge

questions.question: Do I need to be a professional developer to participate?
questions.answer: No, anyone working on a creative project can join. Whether you're a programmer, designer, content creator, or entrepreneur - all creative builders are welcome.

questions.question: Does my project need to be a tech product?
questions.answer: Not necessarily. While our community focuses on tech products, we welcome content products, design projects, business plans, and other creative endeavors.

questions.question: Do I need to check in every day?
questions.answer: You need at least 9 check-ins during the 21-day period to complete the challenge. More frequent check-ins typically lead to better results.

questions.question: Is there a fee to participate?
questions.answer: No, participation is completely free. We focus on building a supportive community for independent developers.
